name: Connect your hands to the game
name_original: Connect your hands to the game
description:
/!\ 

For some levels your keyboard must to be a 6KRO.

Please note that certains levels not work depending to the rollover keyboard.

Not all levels need 6KRO, and you can enable no challenge mode in menu

For the GMTK jam, use your fingers to press and hold keys. When you'are holding, you're connected with the player and you can control him. If you break the connection, you die. So don't release any fingers.
